content.raw:
Using cloudsim-prerelease 1.2.7 with the simulator_prerelease configuration, my start_sim.bash on the simulator machine has this content:

    echo date "  " >> /home/ubuntu/cloudsim/start_sim.log

    . /usr/share/drcsim/setup.sh
    export ROS_IP= 10.0.0.51
    export GAZEBO_IP= 10.0.0.51
    export DISPLAY=:0
    roslaunch   
    gzname:=gzserver   &

Should be using the server-side OpenVPN address (should be 11.8.0.1).

Also the roslaunch line is mangled, probably from bad substitution in generating the script.

Also /etc/openvpn/openvpn.conf on the simulator machine has the wrong address configuration.  It's giving itself 11.8.0.2, which should be the client's address.

Also the security group generated for this machine doesn't allow UDP traffic over 1194, needed for OpenVPN to work.

Also, the GAZEBO_IP and GAZEBO_MASTER_URI should be uncommented in the client-side ros.bash file.

With all of those changes, I was able to run both rviz and gzclient, talking to the remove simulation instance.
